SELECT * FROM ( SELECT
FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY V.CUL_SEQ DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$ + 1) AS PAGE,
FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY V.CUL_SEQ DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$ + 1) AS PAGE,
FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY V.VIEW_CNT DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$ + 1) AS PAGE,
V.CUL_SEQ , V.CUL_GRP1 , V.CUL_GRP2 , V.CUL_NAME , V.CUL_USER , V.CUL_EMAIL , V.CUL_TEL , V.CUL_FAX , V.CUL_OPENDAY , V.CUL_OPENNAME, V.CUL_CLOSEDAY, V.CUL_BESTNAME, V.CUL_HOMEURL , V.CUL_MAPURL , V.CUL_MAPIMG , V.CUL_CONT , V.CUL_VIEWIMG1, V.CUL_VIEWIMG2, V.CUL_VIEWIMG3, V.CUL_VIEWIMG4, V.VIEW_CNT, to_char(V.CUL_REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')CUL_REGDATE , DECODE ( V.POST_FLAG , 'Y' , '승인' , 'N' , '미승인' , '대기') AS POST_FLAG , V.CUL_PLACE || ' ' || V.CUL_PLACE2 AS CUL_PLACE , (SELECT VALUE FROM PCN_COMMON_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'LOCATION' AND NAME = CUL_PLACE) CUL_ADDR , V.APPLY_YN, V.APPLY_URL, R.APPROVAL RENTAL_APPROVAL, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PORTAL_RENTAL_APPLY A WHERE A.P_SEQ = R.SEQ) APPLY_CNT
FROM VLI_VLI_CUL V , PORTAL_RENTAL R WHERE V.CUL_SEQ = R.CUL_SEQ(+)
V.CUL_GRP1 = #grp#
V.CUL_NAME LIKE '%' || #name# || '%'
V.APPLY_YN = #apply_yn#
( V.APPLY_YN = 'N' OR V.APPLY_YN = 'W' )
V.POST_FLAG = #post_flag#
R.APPROVAL = #approval#
V.CUL_REGDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start# || '00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE('$reg_start$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
V.CUL_REGDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start# || '00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE('$reg_end$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
) R WHERE R.PAGE = #page_no#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM VLI_VLI_CUL V , PORTAL_RENTAL R WHERE V.CUL_SEQ = R.CUL_SEQ(+)
V.CUL_GRP1 = #grp#
V.CUL_NAME LIKE '%' || #name# || '%'
V.APPLY_YN = #apply_yn#
( V.APPLY_YN = 'N' OR V.APPLY_YN = 'W' )
V.POST_FLAG = #post_flag#
R.APPROVAL = #approval#
V.CUL_REGDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start# || '00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE('$reg_start$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
V.CUL_REGDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start# || '00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE('$reg_end$ 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT SEQ , PERSON , CHARGE , CHARGE_YN , PAY_OPTION , RENTAL_DT , RENTAL_INFO , OTHER , APPROVAL FROM PORTAL_RENTAL WHERE CUL_SEQ = #cul_seq#
AND ROWNUM < 2

SELECT R.* FROM ( SELECT FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC)-1)/$list_unit$ + 1) AS PAGE , A.SEQ , C.CUL_NAME , A.USER_ID , A.PERSON , A.TEL , A.EMAIL , DECODE(A.APPROVAL , 'Y' , '승인' , 'N' , '미승인' , 'W', '접수', 'P', '승인대기') APPROVAL , TO_CHAR(A.RENTAL_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') RENTAL_DT , A.START_TIME , A.END_TIME , A.PURPOSE FROM PORTAL_RENTAL_APPLY A, PORTAL_RENTAL R , VLI_VLI_CUL C WHERE A.P_SEQ = R.SEQ AND R.CUL_SEQ = C.CUL_SEQ AND C.CUL_SEQ = #cul_seq#
A.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #keyword# || '%'
A.APPROVAL = #approval#
) R WHERE R.PAGE = #page_no#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PORTAL_RENTAL_APPLY A, PORTAL_RENTAL R , VLI_VLI_CUL C WHERE A.P_SEQ = R.SEQ AND R.CUL_SEQ = C.CUL_SEQ AND C.CUL_SEQ = #cul_seq#
A.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #keyword# || '%'
A.APPROVAL = #approval#

SELECT M.NAME , A.EMAIL , '시설예약' AS TITLE , C.CUL_NAME || ' ' || TO_CHAR(A.RENTAL_DT , 'YYYY.MM.DD') || ' ' || A.START_TIME || '시 ~ ' || A.END_TIME || '시' SUBJECT , DECODE(#updateStatus# , 'Y' , '승인' , 'N' , '미승인') APPROVAL FROM PORTAL_RENTAL_APPLY A , PORTAL_RENTAL R , VLI_VLI_CUL C , PCN_MEMBER M WHERE A.P_SEQ = R.SEQ AND C.CUL_SEQ = R.CUL_SEQ AND A.USER_ID = M.USER_ID
